summary: Meet, Prem, and Amar look to have a blast at their college reunion, though they soon find themselves in another predicament.
cast: Vivek Oberoi|Riteish Deshmukh|Aftab Shivdasani|Karishma Tanna|Manjari Fadnnis|Sonalee Kulkarni|Pradeep Singh Rawat|Kainaat Arora|Bruna Abdullah|Maryam Zakaria|Suresh Menon|Megha Moohie Tyagi|Palash Dutta|Shahid Hasan|Gargi Patel
title: Grand Masti
